Module: aui-tool

The ToolItem Utility - ToolItems are iconic buttons that provide interaction states and event handling

This module contains the following classes:

  • ToolItem
  • ToolSet

Submodules:

aui-tool-item
The ToolItem Utility - ToolItems are iconic buttons that provide interaction states and event handling
aui-tool-set
The ToolSet Utility is a managed collection of ToolItems.
